headline: Is Marathon Petroleum a Bargain After 35.5% Share Price Surge in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Marathon Petroleum is a bargain or getting too expensive? You are not alone. Let's take a closer look at what the numbers say about the stock's value. The share price has surged 35.5% so far this year and is up a massive 438.6% over the past five years, although it has dipped slightly by -2.3% over the last month. Much of this recent movement has been accompanied by headlines around Marathon’s strategic investments in renewable fuels and ongoing industry consolidation. Both of...
